original:
Drop the hammer as you race and
battle with Mario and Co.!
translation:
Drop the hammer as you race and
battle with Mario and Co.!

original:
Compete only with players
who have Mario Kart DS.
translation:
Compete only with players
who have Mario Kart DS.

original:
Compete with players
who don't have Mario Kart DS.
translation:
Compete with players
who don't have Mario Kart DS.

original:
Choose a group to enter.
To create a new group,
choose CREATE GROUP.
translation:
Choose a group to enter.
To create a new group,
choose CREATE GROUP.

original:
Up to 7 other racers can
join your group. Touch
Cut Off to stop accepting
entries and begin racing.
translation:
Up to 7 other racers can
join your group. Touch
Cut Off to stop accepting
entries and begin racing.

original:
Awaiting other racers...
Please wait a moment.
translation:
Awaiting other racers...
Please wait a moment.
